name: OutFun
description:
In your old toys box you've found an unnamed console cartridge. What could be inside? Turn on the game and see!

Spoiler: This is a pseudo-3D racing game. Made with C++ and SFML.  The main purpose was to make a game look as close as possible to old 16-bit racing games.

Controls:

Enter - Pick a difficulty

A / D - Turn Left / Right

W / S - Speed Up / Down

P - Pause

Assets used:

Background

Trees

Player's Car

Other Cars

Also a big thanks to Captain4LK  for his help.
